attributes.action: Stop building new houses for council tenants!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If they can't be bothered to get off their backsides and work for a living, then why give them a new house? There are plenty of the old council flats and houses left so let them have them and give low income "workers" the opportunity to part own new builds. I have to pay £900 pm mortgage and work very hard to keep my home, so why can't others do the same ....... stop making it easy for them!!!!!!
